name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a results-driven Senior Quality Engineer with 8 years of experience, I excel in **test automation**, **software testing**, and **version control** using **Git**. My strong scripting skills in **Python** and **Shell** enable me to develop efficient testing frameworks for embedded systems on **Linux** and **Android**, including experience with **QNX** and **Android/ADB**. I am proficient in using **Pytest** and **Appium** for comprehensive testing of automotive software, including familiarity with **CAN** and **Ethernet** protocols.
I possess exceptional **analytical skills** and **problem-solving abilities**, combined with excellent **time management** and a proactive **initiative** to drive quality improvements. My background in full-stack development, complemented by deep technical expertise in modern frameworks such as **React**, **Next.js**, and **Node.js**, along with **AWS** and **Azure** cloud environments, empowers me to lead quality assurance for high-performance solutions in health and finance sectors.
